metadata.author: User
metadata.description: This JSON file contains detailed information about Lance's relationships with his friends, including key events and interactions from Lance's perspective. It outlines the dynamics within his social circle.
metadata.intendedUse: This file is intended to provide context and background on Lance's personal relationships. When using this data to reference events or relationships involving other individuals in Lance's network, such as Alex, interpret and adjust the perspective to fit the subject being discussed to ensure accuracy and relevance.
metadata.useCase: Real-life references for personalized interactions and dialogue generation

history.event: Met the summer before their freshmen year of college due to being part of the same 'Honors Living and Learning Community' scholarship at Rutgers Newark.
Dormed in a hotel, for the semester of their senior year of college due to unforeseen circumstances with the scholarship's dorming allocation.
Dressed up as women on Halloween to trick guys into giving them free drinks.
Went on a helicopter ride with Alex, inviting a stranger from campus.
Got tattoos in Cancun for Lance's 24th birthday along with Juan and Jenny.

relationships.name: Navjot
relationships.howTheyMet: In high school when they were in the same dance class
typicalActivities: Watching Jubilee videos together on YouTube
secretly smoking weed and laughing together

history.event: Met in dance class while Lance was a sophomore in high school and Navjot was a junior.
Navjot attended Lance's senior prom as her then boyfriend Jecci's date to the prom.
Lance and Navjot became distant as Lance went to college in Newark and Navjot was in her second year of community college.
Lance was there for Navjot after she got cheated on by her now ex-boyfriend, Jecci.
Lance and Navjot's friendship became rocky since Lance was more there for her ex-boyfriend Jecci due to their brotherly bond and Jecci being the one who hurt Navjot by cheating.

Lance and Navjot rekindled their friendship as Lance apologized for not properly being there for her. They began to hang out at Lance's house more regularly, although Jecci and Navjot are still not on good terms.
They got tattoos together on Friday the 13th. Lance got the sword from Adventure Time on his thigh and Navjot got finger tattoos.
Got drunk together and laughed so hard together while imagining The Weeknd performing live at the Bahama Breeze they were eating at together.

frequentDisagreements: what video to watch on YouTube

relationships.name: Julia
relationships.howTheyMet: Met in Dance II class during Lance's senior year of high school

history.event: Lance met Julia in Dance II class while he was a senior and she was a junior.
Lance and Julia got close during class and often paired up as dance partners. Jecci, Frankie, and Elijah would always tease Lance about it during class.
Lance found out Julia was already in a relationship.
Julia went on a break with her boyfriend due to arguments.
Lance and Julia went to the town fair on a date and shared a kiss on a park bench.
Lance and Julia began seeing each other and going on spontaneous dates.
Lance and Julia would secretly sneak out of their houses to meet up late at night.

Julia, a junior, had been asked to senior prom by Kenton, a classmate of Lance, right after she went on a break with her boyfriend and before she and Lance got closer. On the night of the prom, Julia attended with Kenton but ultimately snuck away to spend time with Lance. Jecci attended the senior prom with his girlfriend, Navjot, and Frankie attended with his girlfriend, Ysabel.
As summer ended and Lance entered college while Julia started her senior year, they agreed to stop seeing each other because Julia was still on break with her boyfriend.
Julia broke up with her boyfriend officially, spent a night with Lance, and they caught up. They ultimately decided that they should both remain single.
Since their interaction the previous year, they hadn't spoken and moved on with their lives, but both still had a special place in each other's hearts.
After two years of no contact, Lance randomly called Julia, who was currently single, to go on a date for Valentine's Day.

Julia agreed to film their Valentine's date for Lance's YouTube channel. Lance planned the entire day, from catching up at the park where they had their first date, to ice skating in the afternoon where kids thought Lance was famous because he was vlogging, to receiving an astrology reading from Lance's roommate Alex while Lance set up a candlelit dinner complete with a custom laminated menu. Fabio dressed up as a chef who actually cooked the meals they chose, and Jecci dressed up as their waiter taking the orders.
Lance created an awesome YouTube video about their Valentine's date that involved all of Lance's friends throughout the vlog, and Julia loved it.

Two days after seeing the Valentine's Day video, Julia asked Lance not to post it because it would complicate things if her ex-boyfriend, who she was reconnecting with, saw it due to Lance and Julia's complicated relationship in high school. Despite Lance's friends' disagreement, Lance decided to delete the video and never post it.
Lance and Julia realized there couldn't be a real relationship between them and decided to just be good friends.
They haven't spoken since 2019.

frequentDisagreements: On what their relationship really is

relationships.name: Francisco
relationships.howTheyMet: In math class during Middle School
relationships.conflictHandling: 'My bad bro' followed by the friend responding with 'you good'

history.event: During 6th grade Lance and Frankie had the same math class.
In 8th grade Lance, Frankie, and Jecci formed a tight-knit friend group and a dance crew called 'Breakwave.'
Freshman year of high school, Lance, Jecci, and Frankie joined the 'Dance Xchange' club.

In their junior year of high school, Lance, Jecci, and Frankie went to junior prom with their respective senior girlfriends: Lance went with Rizelyn, Jecci went with Navjot, and Frankie went with Ysabel.
Senior year of high school, performed with Jecci and Frankie as a dance crew in front of the entire high school.

In our senior year of high school, Jecci, Frankie, and I went to senior prom with our dates. Jecci went with his girlfriend Navjot, Frankie went with his girlfriend Ysabel, and I went with Julia, who I was just seeing at the time.
Lance and Frankie went to the same college at Rutgers Newark. But they formed their own separate friend groups.
Lance was there for Frankie when he and Ysabel broke up because Frankie had cheated on Ysabel.

Lance and Frankie reconnected after becoming distant in college and now started actively going to the gym together and Frankie introduced Lance to his new girlfriend, Pia who Lance knew and met already since she was in the same Filipino club as Lance in college.

frequentDisagreements: When to pass the basketball during NBA 2K games that they play

history.event: Met in the college dorms through Fabio on the day of Juan's birthday.
Weekly Smash brothers tournaments at Lance and Alex's dorm.
Got tattoos in Cancun for Lance's 24th birthday along with Alex and Jenny.
Trained and ran a marathon together, both completing it under 6 hours.

relationships.name: Fabio
relationships.howTheyMet: Met in college during freshman orientation
typicalActivities: playing Super Smash Brothers Ultimate together

history.event: Met at Freshmen orientation during college.
Weekly Smash brothers tournaments at Lance and Alex's dorm.
Competed in a Smash Bros tournament where Lance and Fabio faced off at NJIT where Fabio won the best of 7.
Introduced Fabio to volleyball through watching the show 'Haikyuu' together, sparking his interest in the sport.
Fabio, Lance, and Juan meet up at Rutgers Newark to play volleyball on Sundays.

frequentDisagreements: Who is better in Super Smash Brothers

relationships.name: Jenny
relationships.howTheyMet: She lived next door in college
typicalActivities: playing Super Smash Brothers Ultimate together

history.event: Met the summer before their freshmen year of college due to being part of the same 'Honors Living and Learning Community' scholarship at Rutgers Newark.
Their dorms were next to each other on the 8th floor, and they became good friends as well as neighbors.
Jenny got hospitalized because of a terrible car accident and Lance was one of the first people to visit and called Jenny's mom to deliver the unfortunate news.
Lance helped Jenny recover from a temporary disability by helping her practice walking again by traveling to their alma mater daily from Jenny's house in Newark.
Romantic feelings developed between the two and they began dating as Jenny got better and better.
For their one year, Lance surprised Jenny with NBA playoffs tickets for Nets vs Celtics.
Got tattoos in Cancun for Lance's 24th birthday along with Juan and Alex.
Lance and Jenny broke up due to differences on how they saw their individual future despite the love and friendship they had and cultivated together.
Reconnected at Alex's 25th birthday, having both moved on from each other. They transitioned to a friendship that is now platonic. Also, Jenny has a new boyfriend named Steve.
Ashley made signs to support both Juan and Lance when they ran their marathon.

relationships.name: Anna
relationships.howTheyMet: Met at Honors Living & Learning Community orientation during freshman year of college

history.event: Lance and Anna met at the interview round for the scholarship they both applied for called 'Honors Living Learning Community' at Rutgers Newark.
Lance and Anna actually went on a date but ultimately decided their relationship was just platonic.
Formed a friend group along with Alex, Juan, Fabio, and Jenny at Rutgers Newark.
Lance supported Anna through personal struggles during their college years.
Anna and her boyfriend, Gabe, hosted their now yearly Thanksgiving with their friend group from college.

frequentDisagreements: Which sushi place to go to

relationships.name: Jecci
relationships.conflictHandling: Direct and honest discussions followed by quick resolutions

history.event: Met in 5th grade but they had their own friends.
Went to Fords Middle School along with Frankie and the trio got closer as they were all Filipino.
In 8th grade Lance, Frankie, and Jecci formed a tight-knit friend group and a dance crew called 'Breakwave.'
Freshman year of high school, Lance, Jecci, and Frankie joined the 'Dance Xchange' club.

In their junior year of high school, Lance, Jecci, and Frankie went to junior prom with their respective senior girlfriends: Lance went with Rizelyn, Jecci went with Navjot, and Frankie went with Ysabel.
Senior year of high school, performed with Jecci and Frankie as a dance crew in front of the entire high school.

In our senior year of high school, Jecci, Frankie, and I went to senior prom with our dates. Jecci went with his girlfriend Navjot, Frankie went with his girlfriend Ysabel, and I went with Julia, who I was just seeing at the time.
Lance and Jecci became distant as Lance went to college and Jecci decided to do a mechanic apprenticeship.
When Jecci cheated on Navjot and broke up, Lance, being both their friends, was there for Jecci separately from Navjot.
Jecci would often visit Lance and his friend group in college and the friends would encourage Jecci to put himself out there again after being single for a while.
Jecci introduced Lance to his new girlfriend, Jasmine, and they are both happy as Jecci has grown from his previous mistakes.

frequentDisagreements: When to gank in League of Legends
How to build characters in video games

relationships.name: Rizelyn
relationships.howTheyMet: Met during the high school masquerade during Lance's junior year and Rizelyn's senior year

history.event: During the high school masquerade, Lance met Rizelyn serendipitously and asked for her number.
Rizelyn and Lance started dating.
Lance asked Rizelyn to his junior prom by creating a romantic video themed around her favorite movie at the time, Big Hero Six.
Rizelyn, a senior, attended Lance's junior prom. Navi and Ysabel, also seniors, attended as Jecci's and Frankie's dates respectively.

Lance attended Rizelyn's senior prom, along with Jecci and Frankie. Rizelyn, Navi, and Ysabel were all seniors at the time, and Lance, Jecci, and Frankie, who were juniors, went as their respective dates.
Rizelyn started her freshman year at Rutgers New Brunswick, and Lance started his senior year of high school.
Lance and Rizelyn grew distant and broke up due to being at different points in their lives.
Rizelyn found a new boyfriend at her college, and Lance moved on after meeting Julia.
